Package com.epam.facultative.model.service

Interface GeneralService

All Known Implementing Classes:
GeneralServiceImpl
public interface GeneralService
GeneralService interface. Implement all methods in concrete EventService
Version:

Author:

  • Method Details

    • authorization

      UserDTO authorization(String login, String password) throws ServiceException, ValidateException
      Calls DAO to get relevant entities by login
      Parameters:
      login - - param to find
      password - - to check if matches with user password
      Returns:
      UserDTO - relevant to User entity
      Throws:
      ServiceException - - may wrap DAOException or be thrown by another mistakes
      ValidateException - - occurs in case of non-validation of data

    • getCourses

      Parameters:
      param - - param to find
      Returns:
      Map.Entry<Integer, List < CourseDTO>> - relevant to Course entity
      Throws:
      ServiceException - - may wrap DAOException or be thrown by another mistakes

    • downloadAllCoursesInPdf

      ByteArrayOutputStream downloadAllCoursesInPdf(String locale, AppContext appContext) throws ServiceException
      Calls PdfCreator to create pdf
      Parameters:
      locale - - used for document localization
      appContext - - used to call PdfCreator
      Returns:
      ByteArrayOutputStream - for download
      Throws:
      ServiceException - - may wrap DAOException or be thrown by another mistakes

    • recoveryPassword

      void recoveryPassword(String email, AppContext appContext) throws ServiceException, ValidateException
      Calls EmailSender to send new password and calls DAO to update User with new password
      Parameters:
      email - - used for send email
      appContext - - used to call EmailSender
      Throws:
      ServiceException - - may wrap DAOException or be thrown by another mistakes
      ValidateException

    • changePassword

      void changePassword(String oldPassword, String newPassword, int userId) throws ServiceException, ValidateException
      Calls DAO to update User with new password
      Parameters:
      userId - - id to find user by
      oldPassword - - old password
      newPassword - - new password
      Throws:
      ServiceException - - may wrap DAOException or be thrown by another mistakes
      ValidateException - - occurs in case of non-validation of data

    • addAvatar

      UserDTO addAvatar(int userId, InputStream avatar) throws ServiceException, ValidateException
      Calls DAO to add avatar User
      Parameters:
      userId - - id to find user by
      avatar - - image for add
      Returns:
      UserDTO - user with new avatar
      Throws:
      ServiceException - - may wrap DAOException or be thrown by another mistakes
      ValidateException - - occurs in case of non-validation of data
